item.onclick: RunScript(script.skin.helper.service,action=setskinsetting,setting=$INFO[Container(9000).ListItem.Property(name)].widgets,header=Widget Chooser,simple to set your favorite widget)

item.label: Choose content for 1L
item.onclick: RunScript(script.skin.helper.service,action=setskinsetting,setting=Gallery_1l,header=Widget Chooser,simple to set your favorite widget in Gallery)
